children.description: Question: Could you please specify which island in the USA you are planning to visit? This will help me provide accurate weather forecasts and images relevant to your destination.

Since the query specifies "the most famous island of the USA," it would be reasonable to consider islands like Oahu, Hawaii, as this is a popular destination. The next steps will involve searching for the 7-day weather forecast specifically for this area and acquiring images of the beaches on the island.

I will start by searching for weather information.

The search for the 7-day weather forecast in Oahu didn't yield any direct results through the API tools. However, I can continue by fetching images of the beaches in Oahu, Hawaii, to enrich the information provided. Let's proceed with getting some visually appealing images of Oahu beaches.

children.description:
I successfully retrieved visual content for your inquiry. Here are images and links from popular beaches around Oahu, Hawaii:

1. [Best Beaches on Oahu | Top Spots for Sun and Surf](https://voyagefox.net/best-beaches-oahu-hawaii/)
   ![Kawaaa Beach, Oahu](https://voyagefox.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/the-best-beach-oahu-hawaii-kawaaa-beach.jpg)

2. [Oahu's Top 20+ Beaches To Visit & Experience | Oahu Hawaii](https://www.hawaii-guide.com/oahu/beaches)
   ![Various Beaches Oahu](https://www.hawaii-guide.com/images/jcogs_img/cache/oahu-beaches-guide_-_abcdef_-_174c59cafbdf73beeafddf78e7ebb8214e5c8580_-_abcdef_-_a2642993f29912c804eb121c3989275bed8dfd06.jpg)

Due to restrictions, precise data on the daily weather forecast cannot be captured at this moment from the accessible sources. For specific weather updates like temperature, humidity, wind speed, and precipitation probability over the next 7 days, I recommend using local weather websites like Weather.com, the NOAA National Weather Service, or mobile apps such as the Weather Channel app once you specify Oahu, Hawaii.

If this fulfills your requirements or if you need more assistance, let me know! Otherwise, I'll proceed with finalization.

function.name: search_image_for_google_search_json
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "google_search_json", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint is used to perform image search using the Google Search JSON API. You can send a request with parameters like **q** (search query), **num** (desired number of images), **start** (starting index of results), and others. The request will genera"

num.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive

lr.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language

start.description: The index of the first result to return

gl.description: The **gl** parameter value is a two-letter country code. The **gl** parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

function.name: search_web_for_google_search_json
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "google_search_json", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint is used to perform text search on the web using the Google Search JSON API. You can send a request with various parameters such as **q** (search query), **num** (desired number of results), **start** (starting index of results),  and more. Th"

num.description:
Number of search results to return.
Valid values are integers between 1 and 20, inclusive

start.description: The index of the first result to return

gl.description: The **gl** parameter value is a two-letter country code. The **gl** parameter boosts search results whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

lr.description: Restricts the search to documents written in a particular language

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"
